amendatorysection.para: The State Visitors Promotion Cash Fund is created. The commission shall use the proceeds of the fund to generally promote, encourage, and attract visitors to and within the State of Nebraska and enhance the use of travel and tourism facilities within the state. The proceeds of the fund shall be in addition to funds appropriated to the commission from the General Fund. Any money in the State Visitors Promotion Cash Fund available for investment shall be invested by the state investment officer pursuant to the Nebraska Capital Expansion Act and the Nebraska State Funds Investment Act.
